edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.fitting

Class NelderMeadMinimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.fitting.NelderMeadMinimizer

  • public class NelderMeadMinimizer
extends java.lang.Object
    A function minimizer that implements the Nelder-Mead or Downhill Simplex method.
    Author:
    Colin J. Fuller

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NelderMeadMinimizer()
      Constructs a new minimizer with the default minimization parameters.
      NelderMeadMinimizer(double tol)
      Constructs a new minimizer with the default minimization parameters except for tolerance, which is specified.
      NelderMeadMinimizer(double a, double g, double r, double s, double tol)
      Constructs a new minimizer with the specified minimization parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NelderMeadMinimizer

        public NelderMeadMinimizer(double a,
                   double g,
                   double r,
                   double s,
                   double tol)
        Constructs a new minimizer with the specified minimization parameters.
        Parameters:
        a - Reflection factor (default: 1.0).
        g - Expansion factor (default: 2.0).
        r - Contraction factor (default: 0.5).
        s - Reduction factor (default: 0.5).
        tol - Function value relative tolerance for optimization termination.

      • NelderMeadMinimizer

        public NelderMeadMinimizer(double tol)
        Constructs a new minimizer with the default minimization parameters except for tolerance, which is specified.
        Parameters:
        tol - Function value relative tolerance for optimization termination.

      • NelderMeadMinimizer

        public NelderMeadMinimizer()
        Constructs a new minimizer with the default minimization parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • generateInitialSimplex

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix generateInitialSimplex(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector initialPoint,
                                                                org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector componentScales)
        Constructs the initial simplex that is the starting point of the optimization given an initial guess at the minimum and a size scale for each parameter.
        Parameters:
        initialPoint - The initial guess at the minimum, one component per parameter.
        componentScales - A size scale for each parameter that is used to set how large the initial simplex is.
        Returns:
        A matrix containing p + 1 rows, each of which is one set of p parameters, which specify the simplex.

      • generateInitialSimplex

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix generateInitialSimplex(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector initialPoint)
        Constructs the initial simplex that is the starting point of the optimization given an initial guess at the minimum. This method will attempt to guess the scale of each parameters, but it is preferable to specify this manually using the other form of generateInitialSimplex if any information about these scales is known.
        Parameters:
        initialPoint - The initial guess at the minimum, one component per parameter.
        Returns:
        A matrix containing p + 1 rows, each of which is one set of p parameters, which specify the simplex.

      • optimize

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector optimize(ObjectiveFunction f,
                                                  org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector initialPoint)
        Runs the minimization of the specified function starting from an initial guess.
        Parameters:
        f - The ObjectiveFunction to be minimized.
        initialPoint - The initial guess, one component per parameter.
        Returns:
        The parameters at the function minimum in the same order as specified in the guess.

      • optimize

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector optimize(ObjectiveFunction f,
                                                  org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix initialSimplex)
        Runs the minimization of the specified function starting from an initial simplex.
        Parameters:
        f - The ObjectiveFunction to be minimized.
        initialSimplex - The initial simplex to use to start optimization, as might be returned from generateInitialSimplex(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector)
        Returns:
        The parameters at the function minimum in the same order as specified for each point on the simplex.
